Does ne1 know the secret to installing the Dreamfleet Bonanza A36 without it crashing FS9 due to the 500_a36.gau file crashing the program?
If anyone has this for FSX, I'm VERY interested!  Or maybe there's some trick to make this work with FSX?
Can't get it to work... After the flight loades up the screen goes black and after a while FS9 CTD. Anyone can help me out?

Try This -
If you have a crash to the desktop when you load the A-10.
Go into the Panel folder which is inside the Aerosoft A-10 aircraft folder and delete the -
Aerosoft A-10 threat warning GAU File.
I had the same problem until i deleted this file, do we need it, who cares, it works, you gets what you pay for......

It will work for FSX


Just put everything into your FSX Folder


gauges etc and effects and all


And then most likely youll get a black bar at the bottom of your screen


So look into its panel cfg file and find this:

[Default View]
X=0
Y=0
SIZE_X=8191
SIZE_Y=XXXX
How do the guns work? Even when I'm in the air and I press the trigger on the joystick the guns won't work.
